text: Futhi nguMvelinqangi owanenzela kulokho akudalile umthunzi futhi wanenzela izindawo zokuphephela ezintabeni futhi wanenzela nezembatho ezinihlenga ekushiseni kanye nezembatho zensimbi ukunihlenga ekwesabeni (empini) uwuphelelisa kanjalo umusa wakhe phezu kwenu ukuze mhlawumbe nizinikele ngaphansi kwentando yakhe
